Reviews.Title: I love my new KIndle!
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: The screen is much larger and clearer than my first kindle fire.  My first one was fast, but this one is even faster in loading. I loved the first, and this one is even better!

Reviews.Title: Best Thing I Ever Bought since my Computer
Reviews.Author: Lynn b.
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the Kindle Fire HD, it is easy to run my games, check the weather, read books on and listen to music. I love the fact that it has 32 GB and Cloud storage. I was so happy with mine I bought one for my daughter-in-law , she does not even do computors nor laptops, she is having a ball with hers!

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: bridey
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle because it had the highest resolution of all the popular tablets. Also had a 20% off voucher from Amazon for a refurbished Kindle. I am so impressed with the resolution, Dolby stereo sound, 4G speed, etc. I've had multiple tablets and come from a family who always has the latest and greatest. This one by far impresses me more than any of the others my brother has had at twice the price. I strongly recommend going with a refurbished Kindle. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris Peterson
Reviews.Content: The best money I ever spent. Love this Kindle. The sound and picture qualities are amazing! If watching movies the battery doesn't last long but the PowerFast charger does the trick. Be sure to purchase the charger with the Kindle if you intend to watch movies. Just a suggestion.

Reviews.Title: my photos are crystal clear!
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: Programs come up faster and I love seeing all the details in my photos I couldn't see on my first kindle.  Love that my photos are much larger.  I need to read up on taking photos tho, still don't know how or what all is needed to take a photo and if I have all that it takes on this kindle to be able to take them...Using the Internet is much easier and faster as well.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pattie
Reviews.Content: Love it! Can't believe it's refurbished. Easy to use, love the quality and can't wait to use it on the plane.

Reviews.Title: Really researched this decision and so pleased with it!
Reviews.Author: Teresa A. Brown
Reviews.Content: I was very unsure about this and actually was advised against it, but went ahead and tried it and so glad that I did.  I use the Kindle mostly for reading books, messing with apps such as Facebook, and our Sunday school emails our lessons and we read it during class.  My husband uses it when he is playing in the church band.  He uses the app GuitarTapp tabs & Chords and gets his music so that it will scroll for him and he can change from song to song as he needs.  We both love it.  I am able to view Youtube videos and they are so awesome!  This has done all that we have asked it to do and more.  Very pleased with our purchase and we were blessed enough to get it at the refurbished price and you would never be able to tell it was not brand new.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: The fire
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle white just for reading books, Then the kindle fire came out and my husband bought it for me. I didn't think I would use it that much because I used my kindle white for reading and I thought all that extra stuff would go unused until I started using it. I fell in love with it. I take my kindle fire with me everywhere. Now I'm a 60 year old woman who didn't grow up with all this new technology, and I don't like learing new things it frustrates me. This was easy to learn. Now this is where it get good. If I had problems I called there customer hot line. And these people are GREAT. They always talked me through what ever I was having problems with. Usually it was just me not knowing what to do. For instant I like listening to autiobooks in bed. It helps me fall asleep. I downloaded a book and it didn't pop up on my kindle. I called the hotline and they said see the little half circle on the top of the page, push it and your new bood should pop up. Sure enough it did. It wasn't the kindle it was me. But they are always there to help. They have the BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE of any device I have ever owned.  The one thing I didn't like on my fire it didn't have 3G my older white has it and I love it I don't have to be hooked up to the internet for it to download.  I see with the new kindle you can get the 3 G with it and I'm going for it. I also am excited that you can get a camer with it also. I've got noting but good to say about Kindle.  Also if you have a kindle and you want to trade it in for another kindle they will work with you to do that.

Reviews.Title: I am glad I purchased this!
Reviews.Author: Susan A.Savion
Reviews.Content: I took it on my recent trip to Santa Catalina Island and a trip through the southwest.  Unfortunately, I was not always in areas that had wifi available.  Also, it took a bit of time to connect to wi-fi, as there is apparently a 2nd step to take after it says you are already connected before you ACTUALLY become connected.  But otherwise I love the beautiful format.  I read my book(s) under the brilliant stars inside my sleeping bag on top of the island. The lighted page is very welcome.  The attachment light I purchased for my regular Kindle has already burned out.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: kelly Burchfield-Denton
Reviews.Content: I am more than happy with my Kindle Fire!The whole family uses it :) LOVE AMAZON! I'm enjoying prime so much I wish I would have gotten it sooner!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: A....
Reviews.Content: Received it fast. Works exactly as expected. Highly Recommend! Cannot go wrong with this purchase. If you are considering, go ahead and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Sherry Briggs
Reviews.Content: Needs longer charge on battery, needs screen with sun readable(bought a screen cover but does not work, love the kindle fire inside does every thing  I need.

Reviews.Title: thing i like and dislike
Reviews.Author: David Walters
Reviews.Content: Size is perfect for me i dont have big hands. I dont like not being able to recieve plctures in a text. i dislike  that there is no way to take a plctures of anything but yourself! For the price i would think it would have a two way camera!seem like you need to fix that problem.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't hold a charge.
Reviews.Author: S. Crumpton
Reviews.Content: It doesn't hold a charge for more than an hour or two. Need to keep it plugged in if watching movies.

Reviews.Title: Great Pad
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We have several pad at home and this one is as good as any on the market. I use it for books mostly but surfing is good too. Resolution is great and battery life is acceptable. MUCH better than an iPad for the money. All the reviews I read were right, great pad for the money.

Reviews.Title: More than expected!
Reviews.Author: John P. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I have become pretty skeptical over the years so I was pleased when this Kindle turned out to be as great as it is. This is a fabulous product. Internet browsing is a breeze, checking e-mail is as simple as it can be. I joined Prime right away so I had free books, movies, TV, games, apps, everything I could think of immediately at my finger tips. I run a CAD workstation all day and this is a godsend for somebody that does not want to use a computer when they get home. Lightweight, awesome graphics, tons of stuff on it. If my wife doesn't stop borrowing it I may have to buy another one. Really! It's that good.

Reviews.Title: Wish I could give it a 5 star rating
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: My son got the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 as a Christmas present in 2012. If a few unimaginable, disappointing problems hadn't reared their ugly head just recently I'd give the Kindle a 5-star rating, unfortunately for now, kindle is just mediocre. ;/Let's start it this way... until yesterday I WANTED to <3 the Kindle. I've gotten 3, the Kindle, Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and Kindle Fire HD 7.I was sharing my son's Kindle for reading books until I got my Kindle this month (I have the 7" Kindle Fire HD) I ignored some of the "glitches" thinking I'd take the time to straighten things out once I had my personal Kindle...well no such luck.1) There is no way to keep content from anyone you share an account with, be it a spouse, parent or child. Meaning my horror books are visible to my son, no matter what I do, unless I want to delete my purchased content. I personally like to read and reread books, now I'm forced to waste money and get rid of a book...bummer!! Luckily my son is not a kid to open something that's not his BUT some of the title pages are scary for a young child, so I'm left with only one option. Don't buy, or buy and delete, which still makes the cover photo available while I'm reading the book.2) There is an app for monitoring your children's Kindle activity (Kindle Freetime) but it's a pay for app and the ONLY way to keep adult content, inappropriate content from a child's view. Disappointing! I should be able to block material. This could be a solution to above complaint.3) There is no way to organize your books and apps. For someone who has purchased dozens and dozens of books in 8 months, this is a real pain in the bottom. Considering it's actually available on the earlier and less expensive versions...why leave that option off the Kindle Fire HD? Again, this could be an easy solution to the above frustrating complaints.These are enough for me to be disappointed with the Kindle. I'm considering returning the 2 most recent purchases, and no longer purchasing Kindle eBooks, so that I don't risk my son being exposed to books I'd rather he not see.BTW before anyone comments back the books I'm personally discussing are true crime, mystery, suspense books, nothing crazy, no smut, no triple x, I just don't want my son seeing the cover to Black Dahlia or the likes. My son won't be looking for them but he simply can't AVOID seeing them as they are listed in the cloud ;/There should be a way to organize or remove books from view.Darn Kindle I wanted so badly to like you. Great visual, great sound, fast web...but the MAIN feature you are known for...eBooks...really second class.

Reviews.Title: My Second Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kimyatta Evans
Reviews.Content: I loved my 1st kindle.  After owning it for a few short months I began to have re-charging and timing-out problems.  I put up with it for a few weeks.  Then reached out to Amazon.com who were so nice and replaced it for free within less than a week.  My 2nd kindle is great.  It still times out a bit more than I would like but have not had any of the charging issues I had with my 1st one.  If Amazon.com could resolve the timing-out issue, my kindle would be the best device ever.  I love it more than my smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Tom C
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd one I have ordered. Because the first two were defective. I enjoy the Kindle so much more than the Nexus 7 I had previously and much more than my wife's IPAD 2. But, this 3rd Kindle had a ghost cloud on screen. At first I thought it was a smudge and when it wouldn't wipe off, I knew it was a screen issue. Anyway, it's still better than the others. Don't know if I want to bother returning this one again or say forget it and deal with it. Amazon, immediately replaced the cloud or pixel discolored Kindle the next day.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: N. Tierney
Reviews.Content: So I had an iPad through work but when changed jobs had to return it.  I decided to get a Kindle Fire instead since I already have a Prime Membership and loved that I could watch a lot of tv shows and movies for free.  I have to say I love this way more than I did the iPad.  My kids have the smaller version and they are so easy to sync (unlike that other program!).  Just press one button and we all can share the apps and books that we want.  The sound is great and the picture is awesome.  The only issue I have is you can't get as many apps as you can through apple...like Candy Crush Saga, I have to use my iPhone to play that :(

Reviews.Title: Keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: CassieH
Reviews.Content: I hesitated about this purchase and since I already owned  the first Kindle Fire there was no rush. When the item went on sale  I decided to gave it a shot and I'm glad I did. I really like the larger screen more than I thought I would. Well worth the price and works as well as my first 2 Kindles. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I am too thrilled!
Reviews.Author: Kathiega
Reviews.Content: If you love to read and you need a small efficient computer while you travel you will love this Kindle Fire! I would also recommend buying a matching WIFI keyboard and case since it is just great when you need the computer and don't enjoy the touch screen for typing. Ladies, it fits in your purse and you can carry a whole library with you for a few pounds! Make sure you put some books on the Kindle since you do not need wifi to read them but you do if they are on the CLOUD! Amazon is terrific when it comes to giving you free and cheap books!You do not need to be computer literate because Amazon will walk you through everything and they have your back at all times!!!

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Allan Alexander
Reviews.Content: I am happy with lt so far. I wish it came with a free usres guide, it cost me to get one online.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 32 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Christie S.
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this Kindle Fire, and so far, I have few complaints.  This is my third Kindle.  The only reason I bought this latest one is that my first generation Kindle Fire stopped charging (after only having it for 1 year 4 months).  Amazon customer service told me that these units are well known for this issue.When ordering this (via a customer service rep on the phone), I said I wanted a KF without the "special offers".  He said they didn't have any available (?), but I could simply pay $15 to have the ads removed via their website.  Interestingly enough, it arrived WITHOUT the special offers, and it didn't cost me a dime.  Way to go, Amazon!I love the larger screen... the clarity is amazing.  And I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the sound - I don't need to use headphones any more when watching a movie.  I sometimes even have to turn the volume DOWN, it's that good.I don't have the same problem I've seen other reviewers mention... the lagging internet speed.  Mind seems to go lickety split with no trouble.  And yes, the power off/on button at the top is sometimes difficult to find, but I don't think that's anything worth complaining about.The only negative I have (so far) is the battery.  It takes F-O-R-E-V-E-R to recharge it... whether I use the USB cable that came with the unit (and their PowerFast for Accelerated Charging plug), or another similar cable.  My previous KF used to charge in 2-3 hours... now, it often takes 10+ hours to get it charged enough to use it without being attached to a cable.  Seems a tad long, in my humble estimation.The charge also doesn't last very long... I can have the thing fully charged (100%), and it goes down to 25% VERY rapidly - even if all I'm doing is reading a book.  I HATE that.All-in-all, I am reasonably happy with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" unit.  Would I have been AS happy to stick with my first generation Kindle (if it hadn't stopped charging)?  You bet.  Would I have preferred to replace my non-charging first generation Kindle with a plain ol' Kindle Fire Tablet 7" LCD Display, Wi-Fi, 8GB and save $25.00??  Yup, I probably would have been just as happy with that.  But for now, I'll keep playing with this one, and just hope that it lasts a whole lot longer than the last one.

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle this is my 3rd
Reviews.Author: Lynne Bernier
Reviews.Content: I really love the bigger size, it has a great HD picture,plus it is light weight and easy to read.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Yolanda White
Reviews.Content: l love my kindle fire. It does everything I want it to do and has added features that I am experiencing which makes it fun. The speed is fast and the graphics are absolutely beautiful. I am always learning something new about my kindle. I thoroughly enjoy it and would recommend anyone that is thinking about purchasing a tablet to get one. You wont go wrong. I give it a high 5.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: lv
Reviews.Content: I have always loved the kindle fire. And now with the upgrade I have bigger screen, better sound, more and more and more of the good stuff. Oh did I mention I can Skype and I can take pictures. Like I said Absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: Mega Happy
Reviews.Author: Linda K. Shoults "Appy Lady"
Reviews.Content: I treated myself to this kindle and have not bee sorry.  I can check my email, facebook, etc. from my easy chair while drinking my morning coffee.  Reading more books too.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT!!! I LOVE IT!!!!! Go for he gusto and get the larger mb Kindle, you can not add memory. Make sure to add a case, the power charger, and an hdmi cable. We watch shows on our tv all the time!

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Paola Licon
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with my kindle, I'm having the best time with the aplications that it have. I'll buy it again.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: E. Sloan "reader67"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use for multiple tasks.  Love the reading on it.  Easy for me to see and carry wherever I go

Reviews.Title: I can't go anywhere without it
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Received this as a gift to read the paper (its going digital three days a week).  I liked it so much I gave one to my daughter for her birthday.

Reviews.Title: OMG - we love it
Reviews.Author: V. Saling "Book Addict"
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product... we use it everyday... you should get one if your thinking about it... It is so easy to use, easy to read even in the dark... games are so vivid... get one for yourself today.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Ronald D James
Reviews.Content: A great tablet at a great price. In no way would I have guessed that it was refurbished. Basically I just pocketed the difference in price between this and a new one. The graphics are great – I don’t feel silly watching a TV show or movie on this device like I did on smaller tablets. And in general, working with a larger and higher definition screen is a big help for my less than perfect eye-sight.

Reviews.Title: Hopefully the next Kindle Fire and win the name BLAZE
Reviews.Author: Askeptik
Reviews.Content: I like the size and generally I like the Kindle both books and musicI do think it could use a better camera, one with some pixel strength and one that can be aimed outward.I find that Kindle being totally devoid of Google products is a detraction and the access to the web is not great.But I find I am loyal to Kindle and Amazon and Amazon's marvelous customer service.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: Christina Poirier
Reviews.Content: Kindle is very nice and it was a birthday present - she loves it and it is also great for internet, email etc!  Very nice, thanks!

Reviews.Title: Fire H.D. 8.9"
Reviews.Author: John R. Woodson
Reviews.Content: I have had a very satisfactory experience with this unit, it is amazing , the quality in it.  I seldom go to my desk PC now as everything is right on the Kindle.  I am very satisfied.  The only quirk I have so far is the sound.  I haven't figured how to turn it up so I can hear it !  That will come, I'm sure.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Country2560
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle fire.  I use it more than I do my laptop.  I can do almost everything on my kindle fire than I do on my laptop. The only thing I don't like about the kindle fire is that I can't take photos with it.  I still haven't figured out the purpose of the camera because you can't take photos like you can on an IPad.  Other than that I am very happy with the Kindle Fire. +++++

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD is pretty amazing!
Reviews.Author: Marcus Gamble
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for her birthday she reads a lot in her spare time and she loves all those addictive games you can get. Interenet access is great, even in areas with terrible wifi. We skype all the time because we are dual military so good wifi is a must!Only thing I can ding the HD on is no rear camera. I think a rear camera is a standard in technology like this these days... Other then a rear camera everything else impresses me about the HD. Great battery life, great lighting, easy controls, super quick processor, and almost dummy proof!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: pbra133177
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire and finally wore it out.  I just received the Fire HD 8.9 and love it.  So easy to use.The colors are amazing. So pleased with the purchase. And having a camera on it is great.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Kindle
Reviews.Author: C. Mcgregor
Reviews.Content: We had actually purchased two of these for our Grandsons last Christmas.  Of course they love them.  Kept telling me I needed one since I had ordered books through Amazon all the time.  You know what they say about "old dogs new tricks".  Put it off and put it off.  I would order 4-5 books at a time and always had the excuse I still have one more.  Finally broke down and got one for me!  I absolutely love it.  You can do email, Facebook, any apps from the app store, AND books.  Love reading on it.  You can adjust the brightness, the color of background and size of print.  It is perfect if you read at night and don't want a lot of lights on.  I love when I need another book it is instantly there.  It is just the greatest little gadget ever and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire second one
Reviews.Author: Al F Yatlin Jr
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle fire.  The first one I had was good brand new.  I was playing a game on it and all of a sudden a red screen came up and it quit working.  Amazon being the good company that they are sent me a new one.  Which is the subject of this review.  It works good.  Except for one small thing there are lines that go through the screen some times when the brightness is too high.

Reviews.Title: Why would you ever buy anything else.
Reviews.Author: M. O'Brien
Reviews.Content: This unit replaces a gen. 3 Kindle. It is head and shoulders above the old unit which we dearly loved. Now instead of having to drag a laptop along on a trip to do basic things, I take the lightweight Kindle Fire HD 8.9" unit with me. It can do everything I need it to do when I am on a trip. The screen is amazing in HD color and you have the comfort of e-Ink when you are reading. I couldn't ask for a better unit. You can argue all day long about this can do that and that can do this but this can do everything I need it to do and it cost a lot less. That's a winner for me.

Reviews.Title: Love The Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Samssong
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of research before buying the Kindle Fire HD, looking at different pads etc.  I am in my 70's and somewhat computer literate, but was a bit skeptical about the purchase. I've had so much fun learning my way around the Kindle. It's been quite an adventure. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: r. price
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing unit.. good picture.. with real  hd quality even the small speakers sound exceptionalWould recommend this unit to anyone who wants or needs a Kindle Fire.. Simply put the best possible thing you could get for the money

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased
Reviews.Author: Alyshia Selmon
Reviews.Content: Love the HD screen. I have gotten many compliments on how bright the colors are on my screen. The size is perfect and the sound quality is awsome. I would recommend this for children and adults. Its is not just for reading. There are games, videos, movies, and other apps.

Reviews.Title: Terrific
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: I use it for reading books mostly and for me that is where it shines. I've read more books in a few months than I have in many years. I like being able to have it anywhere, waiting for a haircut, waiting for a meal at a restaurant if I'm alone. Less TV and more reading. I do check e-mail, calendar, Facebook and occasional browser, games I don't bother with.

Reviews.Title: Great product with 1 annoyance
Reviews.Author: Adam Gagnon
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire (bought this one for my mom). It is just as amazing as the original but a bigger, higher res screen, and more flexibility as a tablet. My only complaint is it is loaded with ads that Amazon wants 15 bucks to turn off. Having paid 200 for my original, 80 for amazon prime, and almost 300 for a new one trying to squeeze me for an extra 15 dollars to turn off ads that shouldn't be on a product I legally purchased anyway is a really tacky move. I love Amazon but that is a scummy nickle and dime tactic.The unit itself is amazing though. Highly recommended, nothing else in its price range even comes close.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Scrapper
Reviews.Content: It's OK but not a door buster item.The HD 8.9" screen freezes, the screen rotation lock doesn't always work. The additional touch screen (scroll, enlarge, move, etc) don't always work either. I have performed the "hard shutdown" as suggested on line and also by the support group. I don't think that should be necessary for the amount of money charge for this model. The sound and screen resolution are great and when everything works as it should I love it.I liked my regular Kindle Fire better for the above reasons. It never gave me any trouble what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Portable and light
Reviews.Author: Anshu
Reviews.Content: It is a good alternative  to iPadsPros:- 1920x1200 resolution HD screen, but only 254 ppi :(- Light weight- Long battery life- PriceCons:- No external memory card slot- No back camera- Speakers are on the back, which can make sound muffled if kept flat on a bed- "Power adapter sold separately"... really?

Reviews.Title: great machine
Reviews.Author: J. Gehl "John"
Reviews.Content: The 8.9 kindle has not only met but exceeded my expectations.  The picture is wonderful, sharp,  crystal clear.  The sound is better than the old kindle,  but not still cannot hearin moving car.  Love the blue tooth capability.  I did not know if I would like the bigger screen,  but I would not be happy with the 7" sreen.  Over all thank you,  thank you,  thank you.

Reviews.Title: Kindle  Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jewellady
Reviews.Content: The only thing missing is a flash player. I am unable to use my favorite games without it.Needs Adobe Flash.

Reviews.Title: If you like dealing with Amazon, you will like it.
Reviews.Author: tricia
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my tablet and what it offers but it is not easy to set up your e-mail and you can not import you contacts.

Reviews.Title: every body need one
Reviews.Author: raymond varvel
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 5star  because  I think it's great. I just turned 73 years old. Would never think there would be something like this. Every body needs one. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: dhawks
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!  I also have an IPad and hands down I prefer my Kindle!  The size is so much better to take everywhere you want to go.  I just throw it in my purse and I'm off.  The graphics are unbelievable!  I only have one minor complaint and that is the apps are not as good.  To be honest that has improved tremendously since I bought my first Kindle Fire last year.I truly believe the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 delivers on all that it has been advertised to be!  Highly recommend buying!

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire.  Very impressed with customer servies.  my old Kindle started acting strange. not holding a charge and such.  I called the help desk and they walked me through all the possibilities and determined there was a problem that could not be fixed.  They sent me my new Kindle Fire which was an upgrade from what I had.  I did have to pay a little extra but not what I would have had to pay if I had just bought it outright.  Amazon Kindle is the best

Reviews.Title: Great! Great! Great!
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me and I Love it! Everything about it is Great!!! Very easy to use and understand. I would recommend this over the Apple I Pad and to anyone looking for this type of product.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Easy!
Reviews.Author: Carol Rapp
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this and have recommended it to everyone!  Easy to see and easy to use.  Love the fact that I can connect to my wireless at home and if I take it out with me I have the back up connection!  Comes in handy sitting around in Dr.'s offices waiting your turn!!

Reviews.Title: I am the target customer for this product!
Reviews.Author: mchinca
Reviews.Content: Set up was super easy, downloading apps was so simple I was almost embarrassed. Picture and sound quality is excellent.  Don't expect too much in the way of documentation (how to use, etc) but there is info contained in the device as well as a lot of content online.  I am a loyal Amazon user, and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is another win for me.  LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Bill Alderfer
Reviews.Content: When my Kindle Fire expired unexpectedly, I was at a loss as to what to do.  I called Amazon and went through the procedures to fix the problem.  They didn't work.  But Amazon made me an offer that I couldn't refuse.  I am now the very proud owner of a Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  It has met and exceeded my every wish for a tablet.  Great product.  Thank you!  Even for my Kindle fire expiring.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Asseille
Reviews.Content: I don't like the fact that it doesn't have a back camera only in the front. You have to download an app for the camera and the pictures are no where near HD in my opinion. Almost every apps you have to download like an app for calculator which is totally ridiculous. They need to fix that

Reviews.Title: saved a ton of momey buying this instead of the IPad...
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: I have family and friends with the IPad and to me this is equal to it for much less...I watch movies on it, read books, play games and much more....taking this with me on vacation gives me easy access to my banking and bills...I love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Ruby Slippers
Reviews.Content: Only problems ~ not enough storage space and no slots for SD cards or thumb drives.  It should also have USB ports, now that would be fantastic.  Oh and Word 2010 or better.  I love it though.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife, her second Kindle, she loves it. I love it, I don't have to talk to her anymore, it takes up all her spare time!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Unit - Makes free time easy to enjoy!
Reviews.Author: Ronald W Bowen
Reviews.Content: Only problem - no AC charger adaptor. For $300 I shouldn't have had to order one post purchase. The Prime is very friendly and useful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this.  My brother bought me a Ipad and though I use it I find the kindle so much easier and more user friendly I use it to watch my series when I am running on my tread mill it fits perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fast, Fun and Reliable
Reviews.Author: H. Kane "AV enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Having owned an original Kindle Reader and a Kindle Fire acquiring this device seemed a natural progression.  It's relatively light and I enjoy reading books, listening to music, playing games and watching movies.  Much easier to read e-mail due to the larger screen and, unlike my Kindle Fire, I'm able to import and play FLAC encoded music.  A very nice device.

Reviews.Title: Worth the wait!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I saved up for quite a while to be able to buy this Kindle.  I am so glad that I did.  Pictures and videos look fantastic on the device.  I have used the native Kindle reader as well as the OverDrive reader with epub books and both have worked wonderfully.  I've played with many free apps and have yet to run out of things to try.The sound is good, but volume is a bit low.  This only gets worse when I put my case on the Kindle.  Since I don't usually listen to much music I guess this isn't as bad a problem as it might be for some.I love my Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: I got this for my fiancee cause she had the older and smaller version.  She loves it.  Havent heard any complaints, thank god.  lol

Reviews.Title: Great for everything I need to do
Reviews.Author: Mema
Reviews.Content: I use it constantly and don't see why anyone would spend more for an ipad.  Email, games, searches, movies, tv shows and reading!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G LTE Wireless
Reviews.Author: David Matekovich
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love!!The picture is amazing.  Wireless works great.  Touchscreen works great.  Internal speakers work good, I prefer to use my earbuds.  I wish the charging cable came with the wall adapter, you will need to buy it separately.  I bought the Otter Box to go with it.  I also wish it came with the HDMI cable but oh well.  Overall, this Kindle is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Use it Every Day
Reviews.Author: Dogs Rule!
Reviews.Content: I have several versions of the Kindle and am a fan.  Once I received the HD large version, though, I have to say I am totally hooked.  The screen and clarity are great. I use it for email, online work, social media and the occasional video plus Words with Friends.  I like that it is a little smaller than the iPad and easier to stow in my purse, but large enough for everything!  This one has a camera, too!

Reviews.Title: Was exactly what I've been looking for!
Reviews.Author: Jeanie Matthews
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for the "perfect" device for me and this was it!  It was priced right and highly rated (and I now know why)  it's very "user friendly", especially for us "untechie" types.  I've been juggling between the "Nook", a "Notepad" and a "Laptop", but this fullfills all my needs, i.e., email, internet, books.  My granddaughters love the games I can download so it also keeps them entertained!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9 16gb good for the money
Reviews.Author: nick76r
Reviews.Content: I got the kindle hd 8.9 for the kids.... to entertain them with games, netflix, prime movies/shows, during road trips (using my phones wifi hotspot) or other times when i need them occupied. The only complaint (minor) is that the hd isn't really that great of high def... its a little misleading. I remember commercials on tv before i purchased it, bragging how clear the screen was compared to an apple ipad. What I mean is that the screen resolution or definition isn't that much more noticeably better than the first gen kindle fire. An example: my 5 year old & I watch a few funny youtube videos before his bedtime, and the screen resolution is much better and more clear on my samsung galaxy s 3. I can hardly stand watching youtube or other streaming vids from the internet because the picture quality is grainy and blocky (?). And that is with using high speed wifi internet in my house! Needless to say, we stopped watching bedtime youtubes on the kindle hd and only watch them on my cell phone.  But, the size, apps, and convenience is great. General websurfing and email is pretty much the only reason i purchased this device. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase. Glad I didn't spend several hundred more for an ipad. If Amazon keeps their technology advancing and competitive, I will continue to be a customer.5 stars because it delivered exactly what I expected and its a good value for what I paid. If I expected crystal clear youtube videos ( which I didn't ), I would have paid 3 times as much or more for apple or some other top shelf brand.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought the larger kindle fire hd for my wife and she loves the quality of the graphics. The kindle is set-up to the user with apps and other information on the home page. The size is just large enough to view but also allows it to be carried in a purse. Great buy would recommend it for the family.

Reviews.Title: Rapid download
Reviews.Author: Kay Parlapiano
Reviews.Content: I can download books at a very rapid rate. Actually, it's amazing how fast books are downloaded. I love it

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jt04320
Reviews.Content: I'm an Apple lover.. However, I can honestly say that I enjoy the Kindle Fire with 8.9" display a little better than the newest generation of iPad. Let's be real, if you own an iPhone, you basically have an iPad. The picture quality of the Kindle Fire is undeniable and in stunning HD. The sound quality on the Kindle is outstanding! It is absolutely perfect for Netflix, Hulu+, or audio books. The tablet is quick and and easy to use. I'm currently still figuring out things here and there. All-in-all, it is a recommended purchase that I think everyone would enjoy. The price cannot be beat! You're getting a lot for you money. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great!Love It!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: The only thing I would warn other customers about is the camera is front-facing.Otherwise,if that's not a deal-breaker,it's a great tablet.It actually does more than I originally thought.More like a laptop/notebook than a reader.And I originally owned a 7" Fire wi-fi edition before this purchase.I thought that was a terrific product.I use the new 9" Fire HD for just about everything.Only use laptop about once every 2 weeks out of necessity due to personal & business programming on laptop.This is a great product.You don't have to be a reader to appreciate it's various uses.

Reviews.Title: I didn't think it could get better than the Kindle Fire, but it did!
Reviews.Author: A mom who like educational toys "Stacie"
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I'd like a Kindle.... because there is something about holding a book in your hand and turning the pages.  However, when the Kindle Fire (with the backlit feature) came out, I thought I'd give it a try.  I've now purchased several... for myself, my kids, and my parents.  IKindle Fire in general:  It's so nice to be able to read in bed with the lights out, buy a book at 10 pm, and not have stacks of books sitting around cluttering up my shelf.  I love listening to the music as I lay in bed with my preschooler.  And it's just handy to have everything.... games, apps, books, music, etc. in one place.Kindle Fire HD 8.9:  This is the best one yet!  I didn't think I would like the bigger size, but I do.  And it's got numerous additional features over the Kindle Fire... including easier online access and my favorite, Kindle Free Time for my preschooler, which allows you to set limits on videos, apps, and general play and provides a ton of content for my 4 year old in a controlled environment.  It is beyond great!  Really really love it and would highly recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for readers
Reviews.Author: Jon Anda
Reviews.Content: I have had all generations of the iPad (including most recently the Retina, which I just gave to my wife).  I switched to the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD because of the way magazines and newspapers are formatted (i.e. clear index and perfect reading layout of each article), the ease of emailing in PDFs and then reading them in Kindle or the Adobe App (where they automatically show up), and the ability to easily hold the 8.9 in one hand without a case.  If you have a laptop and an iPhone as I do, the new Kindle 8.9 is a perfect in between for users who read a lot.  And if you want some tunes while you are reading, Amazon's music product is pretty good (not to mention plenty of storage options for those who want some movies or TV handy for plane rides).Since I plan on sticking with the Kindle 8.9 platform for a long time, I do look forward to a few improvements on version 2.0.  First, I think the processor is a touch slow, especially using the Silk browser - version 2.0 should make Silk feel "quick".  Second, I wish Amazon had MOG quality downloads available for music (or even the MOG app available).  Over time, Amazon certainly wants to be a leading seller of music/streaming and, after listening to hi-quality MOG or Apple Lossless, the Kindle 8.9 tunes sound a bit lame.  Lastly, while I love the Kindle reading products, there is less you can do with an article than on iPad - Kindle needs more tools to forward, post, copy, and highlight.  Sure some of these are available for some products (like highlighting in Kindle books, for example) but the Newsstand offers almost nothing (you can't even save articles anywhere).So it's a great reading device - great enough to make me swap out an iPad Retina - but it's my guess/hope that v 2.0 will be the ultimate (for me anyway).

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I like  the kindle fire HD 8.9.  I just wish it had flash player and the Google app store.  also an instruction book instead of it being on the kindle.  When you are trying to do something you cant read it and do it at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Struggled making the decision but absolutely NO buyer's remose!!!!
Reviews.Author: The Least of These "Repent and Believe!"
Reviews.Content: I have an old Kindle that has served me well. When I was trying to decide on what to upgrade to, I looked at everything from MS Surface to Nook to the new Kindle. I got the Kindle and I am pleased with my decision. It took me literally less than 10 minutes to open the box, set up the Kindle, and get connected to my home Wi-Fi network. The Kindle upgraded itself and all my books, videos, music, etc where instantly "there!"  The screen is amazing and really makes reading a breeze and a pleasure. I had Lasick surgery done on my eyes years ago and have been wearing "readers" (glasses) when I read. The new Kindle with its improved size, display, and other enhancements (love the yellow highlighting!) have eliminated the need to wear my glasses and again, reading (and I read A LOT!) is a pleasure.Buy the Kindle. The ability to surf the Web, get your emails, shop online, etc. are just BIG pluses!!

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Dan Hennessey "ktndawg"
Reviews.Content: This is such a nice product; was tempted to spend the extra for the iPad, but I am happy with this product. Form, fit and function follow through is first-rate. Nearly have it replacing my laptop for most of my uses; already makes my first gen Kindle reader seem like a Dick and Jane primer; no comparison.I would have liked the interfacing with "alien" programs (i.e. Google) be FAR more seamless, but it is what it is...Very happy with my FIRE functions and portability, especially for movies. Sound and picture are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Never thought I would love this so much!
Reviews.Author: Debbie 1
Reviews.Content: I love to read but I love actually holding one in my hands. I love the feel and smell of them and love old libraries. My husband loves tech stuff so even though I told him that I didn't want one, he bought it for me anyway.I think it took me about two weeks and now I am hooked completely! I knew that I just didn't have the room for many more books but I couldn't imagine not having all of my favorite author's new books. Well,even though it's not exactly the same,I not only have their books but have found so many new authors that I probably would not ever have heard of now.I also love all of the free books and many of the apps as well! I am so glad that he bought this for me. I still have a great many things to learn but I am enjoying it more than I would ever have imagined. Thanks Amazon for a quality product and keep making it easier to use. You should also include a manual with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Dislike the battery charging set up.
Reviews.Author: Torri Cable "Torri"
Reviews.Content: Just got my new Kindle Fire and can't wait for it to charge, but why, oh why does the plug in cost extra and the usb charger takes so long.  I think it's mean to not include a wall plug in.  What if some poor soul doesn't have a computer, (unlikely, but it could happen) how are they supposed to charge their brand new toy?  If this was about my old Kindle it would rate 5 stars, and maybe this one will in time- but I'll always think it's very poor service to not include the plug in and mean to not have that noted so old timers like me would have the chance to remedy the situation at purchase time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BARGAIN FOR HALF THE PRICE OF AN IPAD
Reviews.Author: The Queen of Bean Station
Reviews.Content: I've owned Kindles since the first generation.  I sold my first Kindle on Craig's List when I bought the second generation about 6 months later.  I still have the second generation and bought the Kindle Fire when it first came out, mostly because it was in color and was like a mini tablet.  I love the Kindle Fire and just recently purchased the Fire HD 32 GB dual-band WiFi version when my husband said he "wanted a Kindle Tablet" to replace his Sony Book Reader (which is NOT user-friendly at all, requiring you to purchase books on-line, download them to your computer and then sync the reader to the computer....which causes duplicates of the same books every time you sync to download a new book).  I tried to talk my husband into buying a Kindle instead of the Sony Book Reader but he let someone he worked with influence him because they had one, and mostly because at the time the first Kindle had the little buttons for the keyboard and he didn't like the look of that as it was distracting and he liked the concept of just swiping your finger across the screen to turn the pages (on the Sony), which was not available on the first or second generation kindles.Now he uses his Fire HD all the time, sometimes even in the morning to read the newspaper instead of booting up his laptop (again a Sony Vaio which he's even more disappointed in).  He's even using the Fire HD for all his email and recently figured out how to transfer photos from the computer to the Fire HD.  Not everybody can afford the IPads and the Fire HD and buying books from Amazon is sooooo simple!

Reviews.Title: Slam Dunk
Reviews.Author: Foolhardy "A fool and his money..."
Reviews.Content: Full integration with Audible, Amazon Video, and Amazon MP3.  I've been a loyal Audible customer for years and was ecstatic when Amazon took over Audible.  Audible was great to begin with, but Amazon's dedication to customer service is without equal.  When I connected my new Kindle Fire HD to WiFi and discovered that every audiobook, video, and MP3 I have ever purchased was at my fingertips....  I'll just say it was more than I expected from the device I purchased to read books with.Of course, the books are all there as well.  The new Kindle Fire HD is the perfect size for reading--think trade paperback.  It includes several dictionaries in addition to the Oxford Dictionary of English; Spanish, French, German, Italian, etc.  Great product, Amazon, thanks.

Reviews.Title: recommend
Reviews.Author: Deeanne Agozzino
Reviews.Content: Asolutely terrific...better than other products on the market! Would recommend this to everyone.Easy to upoad movies, songs, games etc. Love it!

Reviews.Title: A Tip
Reviews.Author: Inez
Reviews.Content: The one feature that I wish the Kindle had was a LED light to indicate when the device was charging.If Amazon could include that in the next round of updates, that would be great.

Reviews.Title: Surprising number of different uses even for those with disabilities
Reviews.Author: B. J. Barney III "Wheelzup"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about this Kindle Fire HD at first but now that I have it I'm quite happy. Being disabled from a spinal cord injury that left me with little use of my hands I wasn't sure if I'd be able to take advantage of its touch features for navigating around it. I took a chance and purchased a stylus so that I could wind it between my fingers much the same way I hold a pen to write and it works quite well for me. I can read, surf the web some and even play a few games. I ended up getting the 32 GB model just to be sure I had plenty of storage space for some of the apps I chose to get.The display is beautiful and streaming movies and videos on it is just icing on the cake. Reading text-books for school is a breeze compared to my original Kindle saving me plenty of room on my desk and not having to fumble around in a book trying to find the information I needed. All in all it does the job and then some. If I had to choose the best thing about it I'd have to say its size. It is smaller and lighter than most laptop computers I have used yet it is still large enough it's easy to read and carry around. It's not a tablet PC but there again I really didn't need one at this time. In a few months that may change but for now it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Best thing Ever!
Reviews.Author: Sabine Singh
Reviews.Content: love my kindle, so glad I got this larger one, games are a joy as is reading and everything else! Had it one month so far and have had no glitches/problems........my only suggestion is that it should include a start up booklet.....this is my first tablet,,,,,but a booklet showing start-up basics would have been helpful......I love the graphics, colors are so sharp enjoy playing angry birds, impressed with all the free apps that are available......

Reviews.Title: Me And My Kindle
Reviews.Author: MaxJ
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD because I liked the old Kindle with Wi-Fi and this one offered so many more uses.  The games, movies sound guality, everything advertised on this site really.  I also wanted to see what all the rage over Angry Birds was about plus itallowed my niece and nephews a chance to become familiar with this device.My biggest reason for buying a Kindle was the number of books it can hold.  I am an avid reader and will not let go of my books for love or money and as a reslut, I have a room full of books.  The Kindle allows me to continue my collection but with an ideal storage solution.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Joyce Franklin
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 has met all my expectations.  Love the product I am able to do everything I need to do on one device!!

Reviews.Title: Love, Love Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Olevet "I do love to read on my Kindle Fire, ...
Reviews.Content: So much faster than 1st edition fire!, So much more vivid! Great for video's and movies.Love it!!! Self teaching, and uncomplicated. Recieved as a b-day gift yesterday, still learning.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Denise Wullner
Reviews.Content: I was debating between this and the ipad..decided to go with the kindle fire because of the price and it seemed to do everything I wanted the ipad for...so far I have been very pleased with it.  There are numerous apps available for use on here and all of the ones I wanted are there.  Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jerry in Carolina
Reviews.Content: Still finding neat things about this tablet after a few weeks of ownership.  Beautiful screen resolution and clarity.  Looks almost like 3-D.  Enjoy all the books and mags that are available for use along with the free videos if you are a Prime Member.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Didn't care for 7" model but love this one. I own Ipad, Xoom Samsung Galaxy and this. Of all the tablets, this one has the best on board speaker system by a mile.  The color is comparable to an Ipad.  Ease of use isn't quite there yet but only a minor complaint and I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: Bolo
Reviews.Content: Never had an ipad so I cant compare to that but my wife loves the Kindle Fire HD 8.9. Bought it as a Christmas gift and she uses it daily for e-mail, shopping, browsing the web etc. Some people complained in their reviews they needed more apps or other functions but the Kindle Fire does everything my wife needs it to do and more. For the casual user this is great and cost a lot less than an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kendle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: DJGlasgow
Reviews.Content: Just received the Kendle Fire HD 8.9 and so far so good, really love the larger screen and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Really great
Reviews.Author: Harold Carvajal
Reviews.Content: I love it..it has all I need for a tablet, love the size and everything about, I will recommend it anytime.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds my expectations
Reviews.Author: Walter "Walterplus"
Reviews.Content: Love my new device, not too heavy and reasonably fast for surfing the web. Love it for reading it`s a joy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: FroyoShark
Reviews.Content: I've played with a few tablets before, including a Motorola Xoom, iPad 2, and the original Kindle Fire. This blows all of them out of the water in my opinion. Excellent piece of hardware, and at an amazing price. It's missing some features, but you get what you pay for. Amazon's OS is pretty bad, but that can be fixed by rooting.Pros:-Great screen-Good performance-Great batter life-InexpensiveCons:-Lacking features such as a rear facing camera and expandable storage-OS is pretty bad

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, worth the cost
Reviews.Author: Skeptic
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I'm very pleased with it in every way.  I chose this because I'm an extensive Amazon user and this is tied in well.  Other tablets I've tried are equally fine but are tied into other support systems (like the big app choice on Apple), which would be preferred by different people.  Whichever way you go, if you can afford it, definitely buy a high end model.  Add more memory if you carry a lot of media, especially videos.

Reviews.Title: I bought this mainly fir the free time app for my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: Desiree Knott
Reviews.Content: Great resolution. Intuitive. I love it. my granddaughter uses the Fee Time app. It lets her safely explore with age appropriate content.I live the way the email client looks and its ease of use.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: marsha wallace
Reviews.Content: this is my second Kindle ( still use my touch extensively) but I love that I can use this instead of a computer..it is easy to use, once you read some instructions and it works great with my Wi-Fi..

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Marquez
Reviews.Content: I wanted a bigger tablet and since I couldn't afford the $500 Samsung Note, I decided to go with this Kindle.  It really helps with books because since I needed 12 books this years I wanted to get something that would let me get books cheaper. It works wonderfully for almost all I want to do!d

Reviews.Title: WE have one and are getting another
Reviews.Author: Mary V. King "happy listener"
Reviews.Content: My daughter researched the Nook and the Kindle, sadly, (maybe not) she picked the Nook. But after having it, she realized that she saw that the Kindle would suit her needs more....During this time, they came out with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and she was sold on that and had to have it.... SO..... Now I want one and mine is on its way.  I am counting on it to have my lectures on audio for school.  It will be so much easier to plug into it and listen to my hearts content and location doesn't really matter!

Reviews.Title: Great eye saver for reading
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The audio option added so much more to the book which allows both reading and audio reader by author expect to use audio all the time.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day.
Reviews.Author: Nedra Ann Schott
Reviews.Content: People told me I would love it but I doubted that since I don't read a lot.  However, I've used it every day to watch past TV shows or shop or check email......Sure am glad I let my friends influence me.And - for those of us who aren't as techno-savy as some of the younger generation the customer service help desk is very helpful and polite.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: alva
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle product I have purchased.  We are a family of Kindlers!  I wouldn't buy anything else.  You cannot beat the product or the price.

Reviews.Title: Loving It
Reviews.Author: frederick
Reviews.Content: So far I am digging this product. Unfortunately I bought it for my wife so I don't get to play with it much, but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: It must be love
Reviews.Author: csnyder
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire.  I also have the regular Kindle and I just love them both.  My only request is a longer battery.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Love it....like being able to hook up to TV monitor and computer to watch Netflix.  Moved up from reg Kindle Fire and am really happy with the upgrades and the expanded apps available for the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great prduct
Reviews.Author: Lyman D. Elliott
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th book reader.  My first was a small tablet like machine calleda pocket PC with a 4 inch screen and used Mobipocket reader.  My 2nd was the 5 inch Sony reader but with my failing eyesight wanted something with a larger screen.  3rd reader was the Kindle DX that I bought used a couple of years ago.  Worked very well but needed a light attached if I wanted to read in bed before going to sleep.  This is great for reading in dim light or in bed since it has built-in light.  It is only about an inch smaller then the screen on the DX and is considerably lighter.  There is only one thing that would improve this and that would be a SD card or Micro SD card slot.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Karla S. Duncan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 can do everything I want to use it for - reading to watching videos.  It is easy to navigate and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Thure
Reviews.Content: I'm in love and my laptop is jealous.  I watch a lot of movies and read a little, too.  This is such a handy device that I can't imagine not having one now...and I've only had it less than a month.  Now, I wish I had ordered the 32 GB model.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: @Lourack1
Reviews.Content: Would have given it 5 stars if it had come with a user manual instead of just startup insturctions. An old dinosaur like me needs me needs a little help learning how to navigate the brave new world of high tec. And the 'trending now' and 'suggested sites', there mere presence on the screen irrataes me. Ay my age I couldn't care less about most of them, and wish I knew how to just delete them. and, of couse, keep them from being replaced by even more unenteresting sites. I like it though! the Kindle is my first attempt at moveing into the high tec world. I have learned a great deal, but I wish it had come with the manual mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: Violetta Cisotto
Reviews.Content: This is the BEST!!!!We did not have to buy an iPad as this does everything he needs..THe HD is fabulous and he really enjoys using this better than the NOOK...

Reviews.Title: kindlefire
Reviews.Author: hol
Reviews.Content: I purchased my kindle fire for travel. I am glad I Spent the money.  When I asked for support they were prompt and helpful. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Leslie G
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Kindle Fire - I got the larger size so I can use it as a tablet.  I still use my Kindle keyboard to read books, partly due to its more comfortable size & partly because the Fire doesn't allow books to be put into collections.  If you are primarily looking for an ereader, I would recommend the tradional Kindle but if you want a device that can do email, surf the web, allow you to watch videos, the Fire is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Duprey
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she has not put it down since I gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: I Dig It!
Reviews.Author: Joi Veer "Joi Veer"
Reviews.Content: I dig it...everything Kindle said it would be and more!Can't wait to see what they have in store for the next version.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT- BEST BIRTHDAY GIFT EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Love this! It's even better than I had thought it would be. Love the size and the quality. It is perfect for traveling, not bulky or heavy. Picks up wi-fi perfectly no matter where I go, and connects great to my phone when I use the mobile hotspot. The delivery was the best part. I was so anxious to get this and it ended up arriving a day early and on my birthday!!!!  Amazon is the best! This Kindle is the best and it is worth it being a prime member!!!

Reviews.Title: The purchase was a gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: Sonia Perocier
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet that would be great for reading, nothing came close to the Kinle fire, you see my husband read a lot, so I figuered get him a tablet since times have changed from picking up a good book, he absolutely loves it, not just for reading, he plays games, goes on the web, netflix, and most importantly checks out his FB...I would recommend this product...it has so much more...the clarity, the colors is amazing...I would give this product my thumbs up and more If I could.....am glad I made someone very special very satisfied...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rachy
Reviews.Content: cant talk enough about my kindle,  I wish the battery lasted longer, and gave you a warning before it goes dead

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Julia I
Reviews.Content: This will be hard to believe but I don't even have a cell phone so learning to work the Fire is an experience.  I'm a little aggravated that it didn't have a manual with it for people who have no technical ability.  I love the color and speed of the Fire and have downloaded a few freebies so far.  It will take me awhile to learn but the forums, questions and answers, and other help on the internet and Amazon have helped me immensely.  I may purchase a manual if I find the right one.  I probably won't ever use the Fire to it's capability but, I'm enjoying it so far.Being a senior, I like the size of the screen. And,  the brightness and clarity of the pictures is amazing!  The battery seems to hold a long time as is advertised.  I purchased it mainly for using on long trips since I can download so many movies and games.  I do wish it had a front facing camera.Not ever having anything like this before I can't recommend it on it's technical ability but, I can recommend it on the looks, the number of apps to download, books and movies to download, and there are so many things you can do with this thing.  Having it less than a week, I love it but, sure didn't the first couple of days.  It will be a learning experience.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD  8.9  Matters.
Reviews.Author: Claxon,Bill
Reviews.Content: While the browsing experience is notably inferior (silk) and the ergonomics poorly engineered(on off switch,hdmi and charging port)it is the equal for all it does well to the ipad .The screen while not as pixelated, is sharp and better contrasted than my ipad 3 and the image transfered brilliantly to the tv screen via a Cable Matters hdmi cord.The movie choices are fabulous(amazon prime) and free(try that with itunes)But what I wanted to tell you and this you're really going to like, is the SOUND.The dolby stereo excels on its own and when applied via hdmi cable to  the TV , prevails over ipad by a discernible margin.Now lets get this straight the kindle fire hd 8.9  is not an ipad.But it is a superior reader with a better contrasted screen  and sound resonance than the ipad and if you are an amazon prime member, Bezos is making you an offer here you can't refuse.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!!
Reviews.Author: CHK
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire, just wish I would have purchased it sooner. Wanted it primarily for an e-reader with some additional options.E-reader is exceptional, have had no problems. Battery life isn't too bad,can go down quickly but reading it lasts at least 10+ hours without plugging it in if it is fully charged.Browsing on the web is decent as well, but haven't ventured into that too much.If  you are wanting a more inexpensive tablet/e-reader, but do not want to buy an iPad, I would say go for it!!The camera is not the greatest, but really have no need for it as I do not Skype and you do have to download the app to use it otherwise, pretty much good for self-portraits.Otherwise, so far after a little over a month, have had no problems with it!

Reviews.Title: My favorite electronic gadget!
Reviews.Author: Kj
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Kindle Fire 8.9 and love it! I bought a case with a blue tooth keyboard in it and it almost functions as a laptop. My daughter loved it so much I went out the next day purchased her the Kindle Fire HD 7in. They are both great. The only complaint I have is that some apps that I normally get for free from Google play either cost money or they aren't available at all. I am still extremely happy with my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lauren hudson
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas.... because my twin sister wanted the fire. I Didn't even want one. i thought that this invention was going to ruin book stores forever, but when I saw it... this is better than an iPad!!!why?It is the size of an iPad mini with better picture.It can buy everything you can on an iPad, PLUS books. (And movies)It is 400$ cheaper!! :)And it has cool cases. Just saying!!Helpful tips:If you drop this item, it will get really messed up.your text will be all funky. But then I dropped it again, and now it's fine!You can not change the screen savor, so do not try.This item does not have every App that apple products do, but almost.I really hope you found this helpful,- # laurenhreveiws

Reviews.Title: Great gadget, most of all, GREAT customer service!
Reviews.Author: William Chai
Reviews.Content: I just bought my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" couple days ago. I fell in love with the crystal clear screen and how much fun it is. But I did have problem with the micro USB charging port, it didn't charge properly and it stopped charging with very little movement. I called amazon's CS and it took me a minute to be connected with a representative. They rushed me a brand new KF via two days shipping. 5 stars for customer service!

Reviews.Title: BEST BUY THERE IS
Reviews.Author: DaShu
Reviews.Content: THis is the best buy ever.  I traded up from my basic Kindle and this is the most impressive buy for me. Compaired to my sons IPAD, I like the KINDLE HD better.  THe music sounds outstanding, the picture and videos are so clear and the price puts Apple products to shame

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: R. Summers
Reviews.Content: I just received this so I am still trying it out. Seems to be an excellent product and I picked it over an Ipad because of the features for the money! I am very impressed with this product and the screen is amazing! I will update this as I learn more about it but as of now I would highly recommend this Kindle Fire!!

Reviews.Title: Everything and More
Reviews.Author: Oz
Reviews.Content: Actually I don't know about everything yet.  But it's a great tablet so far as I've explored it.My only "knock", as a rural user, I have limited bandwidth coming to the house.  The "always on" aspect of the tablets chews it up.  So I have the wifi disabled at home and load it up with books and aps when I'm in town.  Many of the game aps require online access so that's a bit disappointing.  But for those with non-metered bandwidth, I heartily reccommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32 GB w/ ads
Reviews.Author: Richard Cortes
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire!  The wifi on this thing is great.  It will connect in places where my old 7" Fire wouldn't.  Everything else about it is as advertised.  My only complaint is that the power button on this thing is a little hinky and ambiguous.  It doesn't povide any kind of tactile sense that the button has been pushed and the slight lag time to screen activation leaves you wondering if you succesfully activated the device.  Everything else is great.

Reviews.Title: excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Easy to use .music and video sharp and clean.I bought the 8.9" for myself and the 7" for my wife . Couldn't be more happy with both

Reviews.Title: It is amazing
Reviews.Author: Marley West
Reviews.Content: The KIndle Fire HD is great. I love all of the apps I can find, I love the book layout that it has. The HD screen is great for watching movies and videos.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD  fire
Reviews.Author: Linda Nash "southern girl  grace"
Reviews.Content: Readed the reviewsThis was a Christmas give to my granddaughter she loves it  no trouble at all easy to set upWell worth the moneyThis is better than a regular laptop and easier to use

Reviews.Title: best value
Reviews.Author: David Lum
Reviews.Content: cheaper version of the ipad, well worth the price,,,, i love this item as it goes where I go,,, Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: The Beef
Reviews.Content: Glad to have purchased without special offers.  Christmas gift for my wife.  She had me return an iPad in 2011, and is glad to have waited for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: garyh
Reviews.Content: Have had the product for a little over a month and I love it.  The screen is bright and totally awsome, I Pads have nothing on the Kindle.  Do wish you could improve the battery life, needs recharging way to often for peak performance.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Barb Matthey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  I bought it for my daughter and i but i can't get my daughter to share.  We both love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!!
Reviews.Author: scapp
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire which I broke so they upgraded me to the Kindle Fire HD 7 " but I upgraded to this one for the screen size (I use it at school to follow along with power points in class). Let me say that it is absolutely worth the extra money! I love it and I think that the battery life is better on the 8.9" than it was on the 7". Also I like that the screen is large enough to show all but the offers on the home screen. Also I got the Otter Box case which I also love and I feel that my device is protected in my backpack. Thank you amazon for a great product, I'm definitely a Kindle girl !

Reviews.Title: My 5th Kindle and each one better than the last!
Reviews.Author: Chet or Julie Fullerton "2hot2splash"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely one of the best buys on the market and might I add that Amazon is the finest company I have had the pleasure to work with.  Customer service is unbeatable.  Constantly upgrading their products and the Kindle 8.9 is another fine example.  The added size and resolution make this a "can't do without" item.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Glenda Mahaffey
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a Christmas present to my husband who is so hard to buy for, but he was so surprised and loves it. Whenever he is not using it, I am using it! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Keehn
Reviews.Content: Or should I say my wife loves it.  The only time she let me touch it is to set up her email accounts.

Reviews.Title: I love this
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this so much I purchased one for my son and his college studies.  He now uses this in place of his laptop when he goes to school or when he is waiting in between and works on his school projects.  He purchsed the Office product App for this and he is in love with it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: SEEH3
Reviews.Content: It was the perfect Christmas gift for my wife.  She loves it and takes it wherever she goes and uses it often.

Reviews.Title: I am pleased
Reviews.Author: Book_thyme
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I wanted a tablet or an ultra book when my mom bought me a kindle fire for my birthday. if I was going to invest in a tablet I thought I would want an Asus which has a little more functionality which had some more computer like abilities. However, now that I have had this for about two weeks I am very pleased with my gift. for what I have been using my tablet for it suits me quite well.What I like:1. This is a true media device and if you have amazon prime you will obtain the most out of this device2.I like how this device is linked to all my cloud items and easy to download3.I like that I can download all my Facebook pictures on to my device4. You can still download and view PowerPoint and pdfs on your kindle5.it has a Swype keyboard6. The sound is decentWhat I wish it had:1. That I could create a text document2. A more diverse app market similar to android3. wish it had expandable memoryI have not had any problems with their silk web browser. There is a small learning curve but play with it and it is easy to learn of you are up to speed with technological times. also if you have a kindle ereader you willnot need to purchase a chargerupdate: recently received an email from Amazon saying 11 cds(not mp3) I purchased in the past were available for mp3 download on my kindle and cloud player. One nice feature is I have the ability to close my kindle case or put it in sleep mode and still be able to stream the music.Also after reading through some reviews I realized the camera is functional for taking pictures with a flash,if you hit photos on the top menu bar, there is a camera icon in the top right corner.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Don Juan
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Christmas she loves it ! It's just as good as a iPad 4 and $200 dollars cheaper son ^_^

Reviews.Title: FIRE HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: JAMES
Reviews.Content: I really love  my kindle fire . hd  , easy to use, easy to navigate  great hd. the only problem I have is the volume it does not seem  to be as loud as they  advertise. my son has a samsung galaxy 2 and it is much louder. Hopefully amazon will update the software and increase  the volume for us old guys. other than that a great tablet well done amazon

Reviews.Title: Very cool
Reviews.Author: Steve Bell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is a very cool tablet/e-reader.  The video quality is second to none and the back lighting for reading is a great improvement, as I do most of my reading at night or in a vehicle at work (don't tell anyone).  It's a bit more difficult to hold and it takes a bit of getting used to because of the format, but it is an awesome gadget to have on the road and in places where the laptop just can't travel.  Highly recommended for the price

Reviews.Title: Super Sized
Reviews.Author: L. Glenn
Reviews.Content: I loved the original Kindle Fire, and this one is even better.  Items are large enough so I canselect with my finger rather than a stylus, and all the images are big and beautiful.  The onlydrawback is the increase in weight, but given the advantages, it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Going Small
Reviews.Author: Over 60
Reviews.Content: I have always avoided tablets because I like a big monitor.  I love my knidle Fire 8.9".  The wireless allows me to take everywhere unlike a PC.  I have hesitated being dragged into the 21st century, but glad I finally made the leap.  There is a small learning curve when it comes to the cloud versus the device, but It is a nice option if you don't won't to pay for more memory.  The picture quality is excellant.Some of the cons are all the extras you should buy that don't come standard with the kindle (charger, cables for uploading music from computer, and cover).  The pros definitely out weight the cons.  I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: gf loves her kindle
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure about this for my gf for Xmas. Rest assured she loves the kindke. I didn't want to jump on then apple bandwagon.  The resolution is amazing, sound is acceptable. For streaming videos this is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: S. Shortridge "Matty's Mommy"
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle!!! You can do everything from reading books (of course), to checking email, browsing facebook, listening to music, and watching netflix or even skyping. I use the Kindle most of all to play Sims or Solitaire. Whatever you use this Kindle for, the sound is awesome and the picture is amazing. One last thing, you can access your video library (plus others) on your Kindle from your Amazon account. I purchased a movie months ago, that I watch randomly on my computer from time to time and the sound always seems awful even though my ear buds are Sony. However, I watched that same movie on my Kindle Fire (with the same ear buds) and the sound was astonishing!!! Amazing buy!!!

Reviews.Title: favorite gadget!
Reviews.Author: Mamma bear
Reviews.Content: I use my fire all the time and I don't know how I managed without one!  Great for travel too!  I can do almost anything on my fire than I can on my laptop.  The picture and sound are very impressive.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Product came fast delivery and as expected. Good supplier. no problems at all with this product. very happy and good price

Reviews.Title: Great Device - Far More Than Just An E-Reader
Reviews.Author: I'm Wolfies "imwolfies"
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HD 8.9", 32 GB, without the special offers,as a Christmas gift in December 2012.  It's been great to be able to download various books and search the web.  It's been quite efficient with the various apps that I've installed.  I haven't spent one penny on a book yet.  In time I will, but find it not necessary at the moment.  Another great advantage is that I am able to access my college course materials, via the web, and not have to wait until I get home to study or lug around a bunch of books all the time.I am new at using a tablet type electronic but am getting familiar with it.  I never knew that there were so many free books.  I'm sure that I will keep adding to my collection.  Love to read, but don't have the time to do so every moment of the day.  However, it's nice to have a personal library close at hand. I personally like the large screen, for it makes reading quite enjoyable and not as tiring as reading a traditional book.  I hope that Amazon keeps improving their product and may there be many more happy readers in the world.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
